title: Is Belaqua in New York deserted for breaking water?
subtitle: There is no city in Ploqua, New York, and it was a sad sign that it was abandoned by the cracked part of an art facility.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: There is a sign on the site of the town of Plukoa, New York, which has now been abandoned, and which has become uninhabitable because of waterbreaking.
